Node.definition: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ usually made from stone or wood overlaid with gold or silver; ► functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship; ≈ associated with being worthless and useless
= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ carved out of wood and sometimes stone, ► and functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship
= a column ◄ that was usually made of a single stone; with or without inscriptions, ► as an attribute relating to non sanctioned worship, usually found on a high place (בָּמָה)
= block of stone, whether fully square or not;◄ found in nature or hewn from a quarry; ► used for building houses, walls, and other constructions
= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ carved out of stone, ► and functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= general term for plants that are sources of food; ≈ a sign of God's blessing
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
literally: to overtake; hence: = process by which a certain event takes up so much time that it extends into the time alotted for the event that should happen next
= causative process by which grain is separated from straw by having animals trample it or by dragging a threshing board over it

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= the time of the year when sowing takes place
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

Node.gloss: to cause (someone's) eyes to grow dim
Node.definition: literally: to finish (someone's) eyes; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause the eyes of others to become affected by excessive weeping

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= causative action by which someone causes someone else's life to gradually lose its health and vitality

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= action by which humans scatter seeds or plant young plants in a field so that they may grow into a new crop; ≈ associated with the concept of investing in order to get a return; also associated with reproduction and perpetuation
literally: empty; hence: = state in which an event does not serve a useful purpose and is bound to fail
= a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat
